name: Blackberry Haze
description: Blackberry Haze, developed by Nebu Hybridz, is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze. Unlike its sibling strain Blackberry Lime Haze, this phenotype takes after its Blackberry parent with twisting purple calyxes and a sweet berry aroma. Notes of violet, spice, and cocoa can also be detected in this sativa's frost-covered buds. For those days when productivity is paramount, Blackberry Haze offers clear, unencumbered relief that will typically leave your motivation in tact.
descriptionPlain: Blackberry Haze, developed by Nebu Hybridz, is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze. Unlike its sibling strain Blackberry Lime Haze, this phenotype takes after its Blackberry parent with twisting purple calyxes and a sweet berry aroma. Notes of violet, spice, and cocoa can also be detected in this sativa's frost-covered buds. For those days when productivity is paramount, Blackberry Haze offers clear, unencumbered relief that will typically leave your motivation in tact.

highlightedReviews.text: buds were nice and dense, green and purple color and real frosty... smoked out a bong and delivered smooth and tasteful hits... high was relaxing without getting tired or couch lock..  was still motivated and energetic enough to do things if needed..

This strain is like my weed soulmate. if I smoke this strain before bedtime I can go mostly pain free for almost a day! It also really enhances your mood n puts you in a good headspace. Blackberry haze is a godsend.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Strawberry Blue, Blackberry Haze, Sugar Punch, Pineapple Skunk, and Hardcore OG
articles.author: Anna Wilcox
articles.text:
Summer may be over, but that doesn't mean an end to fun and fruity summertime flavors. This week's strain alert is packed with some extra tasty treats. From Strawberry Blue to Sugar Punch, these gems all feature incredibly unique and full-bodied aromas, perfect for sneaking in one last taste of those fresh summer flavors. 
Visit the Leafly strain Explorer to write a review or find one of these delicious buds near you!
1. Strawberry Blue
Characteristics of Strawberry Blue:

75/25 sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Strawberry and New Blue
Bred by World of Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Delivers head-heavy, cerebral effects
Indoor and outdoor flowering time of 9 weeks

2. Blackberry Haze
Characteristics of Blackberry Haze:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze
Bred by Nebu Hybridz
Sweet, berry aroma with hints of violet, spice, and cocoa
Brings focused and energetic effects

3. Sugar Punch
Characteristics of Sugar Punch:

Slightly sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross of Super Silver Haze and The One
Bred by Sannie Seeds
Berry and lemon aroma
Has dreamy, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 9-10 weeks

4. Pineapple Skunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Skunk:

Hybrid with slightly indica-dominant effects
Cross between Pineapple, Skunk #1, and Cheese
Bred by Humboldt Seeds
Sweet, pineapple aroma
Delivers mellow, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks 

5. Hardcore OG
Characteristics of Hardcore OG: 

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Big Bud and DJ Short Blueberry
California-based genetics
Pungent aroma
Brings soothing, sedative effects
High THC
